content.question: The point of view of the excerpt could best be used by a historian to support the claim that the concept of the New South

choices.label: represented a continuation of previous Southern uses of labor
responded to the economic demands of tenant farmers
fulfilled the goals of racial equality in the Reconstruction amendments
embodied the embrace of Northern models of society

content.answer: embodied the embrace of Northern models of society
